pages.text: Mooreoceras is an fast moving, carnivorous orthocone that lived from the Carboniferous to Permian periods. It hunted by grabbing prey with its tentacles. It lived in an environment that was a more cool tempereate zone rather than a tropical sea.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Egg
